original_text: You will have sons and daughters but you will not keep them, because they will go into captivity.
korean_text: 네가 자녀를 낳을지라도 그들이 포로가 되므로 너와 함께 있지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: You will have sons and daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 아들과 딸을 갖게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: but you will not keep them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 그들을 지키지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: because they will go into captivity
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 포로가 될 것이기 때문이다
